description: Most citizens are not trained engineers who can build chips and electric vehicles. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Li Keqiang’s hawker economy thrives in Mao country
title_page: Li Keqiang’s hawker economy thrives in Mao country | The Straits Times
maintext:
As China’s property downturn continues, local governments are trying to come up with an alternative development model to make ends meet and provide jobs.
A few cities may have found a way out.
